name: A Snooking Suspicion
description:
Use the mouse to shoot each ball once.

Red screen = game over. Z (or double tap) to undo, R to restart level.

Created for the Thinky Puzzle Jam.

I didn’t quite have time to complete levels that thoroughly explore the mechanics. There’s also a little bug in this version that breaks the last level. A post-jam fix + some additional levels will come very soon.
